name: POHODA
description:
This is a 1st person 3D horror game created in Unreal engine about surviving in scary house. This is just ALPHA 1 so don't expect too long story yet.

Appreciate any commets.

In next releases I will add bigger house, more rooms, items and also longer story.

Controls:

WASD = move, SPACE - jump, SHIFT+move = run, CTRL+move = crawl, Q,E - lean left, right;

Other useful keys: Tab, T, F, G, C, V, N
